Waypoints.Name: DELTAVISION
Waypoints.Description: Using high resolution 3D imaging, we have observed examples TIM3 polarization as well as CD8a accumulation at the synapse site between immune and tumor cells. Below, a SOX10 positive cell (left, green) encounters an immune cell (right). TIM3 (red) and CD8a (yellow). ![3DDV](..//images//3DDV.gif)
